content: we humans are not robot we eat,  sleep. And perform various duties but most especially we have emotions ,this emotions occupy a very large space with in us and it can not be put away .in our daily, investment on bitcoin ,we bitcoiners  go through what is know as metal emotions which may be cause by ,greed , panic , fear ,and emergency  ,may cause our brain to start over  thinking and through thinking we may start loosing our investment strategy  and some times may cause a successful bitcin investor to fall back that is why we humans our filling is what keeps us standing and what can also fall us apart  .To avoid emotional decision making, consider to Define your risk tolerance and investment objectives, Focus on long-term growth rather than short-term gains. A bit coin investor will have to Spread investments across different asset classes to minimize risk , Stay up-to-date with market news, but avoid constant price checking and lastly a bitcoiner must Separate his or her emotions from their investment decisions thought some investors may have had some terrible emergency and during that period they are no longer focus they start thinking about the emergency bill at the same time their bitcoin investment. if an investors ,invest in that moment of distress there make have mental emotions because of the market movement which may cause loss of their investment , the sole aim Is  to be moraly and mentaly upright By managing your emotions and staying disciplined, you can make more informed investment decisions and achieve your long-term goals .
